description:
If you have always been in love with Candles and Candle Design and thought one day you would like to start a business with it, then this is the course for you;

In todays world to be self employed and our own boss is something we all think about. To do this in a creative field with little start up costs is more than ideal. The problem is how to learn?

There are so many videos on You Tube yet none of them show you how to create up to date marketable designs and how then to start a business with it.

At last a Top Designer active in this marketplace shares his art form, secrets and formulas that has been perfected over twenty years of candle design work.

This is part of the most Extensive Courses available today for people interested in candlemaking as a hobby or a serious business. Candlemakingcourses is the A to Z of candlemaking. . Courses cover, lanterns, textured candles, manufacturing and marketing in fact everything you need to know to start your own candle business.

When you complete the course you will have all the information to be able to manufacture for retail shops, make to order for interior design stores, hotels, restaurants, weddings, event company's, gift shops etc or your own store.

This has made these courses The Number One On line Candle Education with students from around the world
title: Candle making
